resources.string: Syncplay will search any media directories you specify here in order to find a name that a shared playlist is playing. It is much better if you specify small directories as the searching operation can throttle and be very slow.
Are you sure you want to clear the list ?

string-array.name: tips
string-array.item: For shared playlists to work, Syncplay needs to know where your media files are stored. Add your media folders in 'Settings > General > Media Directories for Shared Playlist'.
Want to use the video player solo? Select a player, tap the Syncplay logo above, then choose 'Offline Mode'.
You can always reset settings to their default states by going to 'Settings -> Advanced -> Reset to Default'
Joining the same room repeatedly? Save it as a shortcut on your device for one-tap access by clicking the small button next to 'Join Room'.
Each player has different strengths. If one doesn't work well with your video format, try another.
Syncplay Mobile allows you to play media from direct links. However, YouTube is NOT supported, yet.
If you want to minimize the room temporarily without leaving, you can go into "Picture-in-Picture" mode where the screen is a small floating screen above other apps.
